tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recipes (
    recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipe_name VARCHAR(255),
    recipe_description TEXT,
    recipe_image BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE recipe_details (
    recipe_id INT,
    recipe_name TEXT,
    cooking_time INT,
    ingredients TEXT[],
    instructions TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE recipes ( recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_name VARCHAR(255), recipe_image_url VARCHAR(255) )
CREATE TABLE ingredients ( ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ingredient_name VARCHAR(255), ingredient_quantity FLOAT, recipe_id INT REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id) )
CREATE TABLE instructions ( instruction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, instruction_order INT, instruction_description TEXT, recipe_id INT REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id) )
CREATE TABLE categories ( category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name VARCHAR(255) )
CREATE TABLE recipe_categories ( recipe_id INT REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id), category_id INT REFERENCES categories(category_id), PRIMARY KEY (recipe_id, category_id) )
